steps.title: Draw the spoon's handle.
steps.content: Draw the spoon's handle. To make the handle, draw a stretched drop shape and bend it a little in the end.

steps.title: Draw the body of the spoon by making an oval attached to the handle.
steps.content: Draw the body of the spoon by making an oval attached to the handle.

steps.title: Using the outline as reference, draw another line following it.
steps.content: Using the outline as reference, draw another line following it. This will give some depth to your spoon.

steps.title: Color your drawing.
steps.content: Color your drawing. Use grey, black, and white to make the utensil look metallic.

steps.title: Add an oval at the top for the bowl or head.
steps.content: Add an oval at the top for the bowl or head.

steps.title: Draw the stem or handle.
steps.content: Draw the stem or handle. Feel free to change the shape of the handle to whatever you like.

steps.title: Add in a design at the tip of the handle.
steps.content: Add in a design at the tip of the handle. Alternatively, you can just leave it plain.

steps.title: Outline your spoon will permanent media.
steps.content: Outline your spoon will permanent media. You can use anything you like (for example, ink or paint). Make sure to erase any remaining guidelines.

steps.title: Color it.
steps.content: Color it. Add highlights and shadows and you're done!
